channel.title: Advanced on umoci
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced on umoci

item.title: Workflow Optimisation
item.description: One of the first things that a user of umoci may notice is that certain operations can be quite expensive. Notably unpack and repack operations require either scanning through each layer archive of an image, or scanning through the filesystem. Both operations require quite a bit of disk IO, and can take a while. Fedora images are known to be quite large, and can take several seconds to operate on.
